title: Consolidated Statements of Operations - USD ($)shares in Millions, $ in Millions

Revenues:.label: Premiums
Revenues:.definition: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

Revenues:.label: Net investment income
Revenues:.definition: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

Revenues:.label: Total revenues
Revenues:.definition: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

Revenues:.label: Revenues
Revenues:.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues:.label: Revenues
Revenues:.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Operating costs:.label: Cost of products sold
Operating costs:.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

Operating costs:.label: Health care costs
Operating costs:.definition: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for health insurance contracts.

Operating costs:.label: Restructuring charges
Operating costs:.definition: Amount, after cash payment, of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan and expenses resulting from the write-down of assets. Excludes expenses related to a business combination, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Operating costs:.label: Opioid litigation charges
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

Operating costs:.label: Loss on assets held for sale
Operating costs:.definition: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

Operating costs:.label: Goodwill impairment
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

Operating costs:.label: Operating expenses
Operating costs:.definition: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

Operating costs:.label: Total operating costs
Operating costs:.definition: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

Operating costs:.label: Operating income
Operating costs:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Operating costs:.label: Interest expense
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

Operating costs:.label: Loss on early extinguishment of debt
Operating costs:.definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Operating costs:.label: Other income
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Operating costs:.label: Income before income tax provision
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Operating costs:.label: Income tax provision
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Operating costs:.label: Net income
Operating costs:.definition: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Operating costs:.label: Net (income) loss attributable to noncontrolling interests
Operating costs:.definition: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Operating costs:.label: Net income attributable to CVS Health
Operating costs:.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Net income per share attributable to CVS.label: Basic (in dollars per share)
Net income per share attributable to CVS.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Net income per share attributable to CVS.label: Diluted (in dollars per share)
Net income per share attributable to CVS.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Weighted average shares outstanding:.label: Basic (in shares)
Weighted average shares outstanding:.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

Weighted average shares outstanding:.label: Diluted (in shares)
Weighted average shares outstanding:.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

Weighted average shares outstanding:.label: Dividends declared per share (in dollars per share)
Weighted average shares outstanding:.definition: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.
